definitions.definition: The act or process of regaining something.
The amount of width a woven cloth grows by when the fibers swell, used to determine the width of the reed to use in weaving.

main_definition: The act or process of regaining something.
secondary_definitions: ( textiles ) The amount of width a woven cloth grows by when the fibers swell, used to determine the width of the reed to use in weaving.
